text: Nancy Stark Smith (1952 â€“ May 1, 2020) was an American dancer. She was a founding participant in Contact Improvisation. Smith was born in New York City. She worked with many partners including Steve Paxton, Julyen Hamilton, Karen Nelson, and Mike Vargas. In 1975, she founded Contact Quarterly, an international journal of dance and improvisation. Smith died on May 1, 2020 from ovarian cancer in Florence, Massachusetts at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from ovarian cancer Category:American dancers Category:Writers from New York City
title: Nancy Stark Smith
